description: The Juggernaut isn't as unstoppable as he used to be, and he plans on changing that! The Juggernaut travels to Asia to recover the Cytorrak Gem! But does that mean that the Juggernaut of old will return?! New Excalibur is hot on his trail and may end up caught in Juggernaut's path of destruction!
name: Unredeemed, Pt. 2

description: To protect the legacy of the Xandarian culture, Nova must escape from the burning ruins of the homeworld. But can he trust himself to use his new power wisely, or will he lose control again and pose a threat to the cosmos greater than the invasion itself? And on the subject of trust, how far can he trust his new 'friend'... Drax?
name: And One For All

description: Escaping ahead of the overwhelming Annihilation Wave, Nova and his companions Drax and Cammi find shelter on a colony world where the population is engaged in a panicked evacuation effort. But can even the power of Quasar and an alien armada keep the innocents safe when the hostile forces roll in? Is it time for Nova to stop running and start fighting back? Or, for the sake of the Universe, is that the LAST thing he should try?
name: Safety In Numbers

concept_credits.name: With Great Power Comes Great Responsibility

first_appearance_concepts.name: With Great Power Comes Great Responsibility

description:
Driven to regain his dignity and burdened by the fate of Xandar, Nova faces the Annihilation Wave head on and unleashes the full power of the Nova Force! But is that enough against such a vast force of cosmic destruction? And if it isn't, who will stand with him in that last battle? Quasar? Drax?¬†
¬†

SPOILER WARNING: Click here to reveal hidden content.
Annihilus kills Quasar but Nova, Drax and Cammi escape.


Nova and Quasar attack Annihilus's command ship to allow the refuges escape. Annihilus kills Quasar and takes possession of the Quatum Bands. Nova, with the Worldmind, provide Annihilus with his first defeat.
name: Ten Minutes and Counting

description:
Planetary travels to Japan to investigate the unofficial history of Island Zero, a breeding ground for giant radioactive monsters.

A deranged novelist named Ryu and his men arrive on Island Zero to begin the planning of a revolution against Japan but discover a giant moth. In Tokyo Elijah Snow Jakita Wagner and The Drummer arrive at the planetary office they are informed by a Japanese Planetary agent that Ryu has discovered Island Zero a place that has giant mutated forms of lizards and insects. Elijah Snow seems to not be happy with his new job at Planetary and soon Planetary arrives on Island Zero just as Ryu and his men walk in the body of a Giant Reptile Ryu shoots one of his followers who refuses to eat a piece of the creature's body Jakita and Elijah rush to stop Ryu but when Jakita hears the gunshot she displays super speed to quickly race to stop Ryu. Ryu and his men are confronted by guards on the island Ryu then chooses to shoot a nerve gas container he has killing him his guards and his men Jakita back up then yells at Elijah to run away from the gas cloud but Elijah uses his freezing powers to dissipate the cloud. Jakita then tells Snow that the giant monsters had first appeared the day after the bomb in Hiroshima she says that there was a glowing flash above the island but all reports were dismissed lost or buried and states that Planetary is unsure of the origin of the creatures and says they died off in the mid seventies and never left the Island or breed. Elijah then looks up to see a giant winged lizard flying above them he tells Jakita that she said they died off Jakita simply responds: "I did. Isn't that great?"
name: Island

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description:
Baron Zemo orders Agent 13 to assassinate Captain America. Can she pull the trigger?

Series and story continued from Tales of Suspense #99.
name: This Monster Unmasked

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description: Professor Xavier, Storm, Colossus, and Jean encounter the benifactors of the X-Men as Magneto regains his psyche.
name: Hellfire and Brimstone: Part 5

description: Prologue to the next big story! Two years before the events of ULTIMATE X-MEN #1, how did Professor X's greatest friendship dissolve into hatred?
name: Return of the King: Prelude

description: The first chapter in the next big story begins here with 2 issues this month! The Brotherhood's war on mankind hits overdrive!
name: Return of the King: Part 1

description: This issue and #29 continue the story line from Ultimate War #4.The first chapter in the next big story begins here - with 2 issues this month! The Brotherhood's war on mankind hits overdrive!
name: Return of the King: Part 2

description:
This issue and #28 continue the story line from Ultimate War #4. Revealed: the fate of the missing X-Man!

Flashback to the Savage Land. After their battle with the security system of the abandoned Brotherhood compound, Wolverine opportunistically drops Cyclops down a ravine.

Awakening, badly injured and barely alive, Cyclops begins the long struggle to drag himself out of the hole he's found himself in.

Back in the states, the X-Men seek intelligence regarding the location of Magneto's hidden Citadel. Professor X supports a distraught Nightcrawler through their incarceration in Camp X-Factor. And Storm and Beast come to an understanding about their former relationship is found.

After a month of dragging himself out of danger, Cyclops is found by a search party and treated for his injuries. The only problem is, they've taken him to Magneto's Citadel.
name: Return of the King: Part 3

description:
Hunted by U.S. Government forces, the outcast X-Men find themselves hiding out in Harlem - seeking the aid of Storm's former gang!

Magneto continues his preparations for his plan to reverse the Earth's magnetic poles. Forge, creator of the power amplifier which MAgneto intends to use to carry out his apocalyptic plan, has second thoughts. Cyclops recovers from his wounds and regains consciousness inside Magneto's citadel. A Brotherhood rescue team is sent to retrieve the mutants held captive at Camp X-Factor. The X-Men are on their way but will they be able to stop Magneto before he causes a disaster?
name: Return of the King: Part 4

description:
It's the X-Men vs. Magneto. 'Nuff Said!

In Miami, a nuclear power plant explodes in response to Magneto's supercharged manipulation. Far away, his Arctic Citadel is under attack by the military and he has the X-Men at his mercy in his control room.

As the X-Men battle for their lives, Professor X and the other escapees from Camp X-Factor race against time to contain the damage from the nuclear meltdown.
name: Return of the King: Part 5

description:
It's the Ultimate fate of the Ultimate X-Men as humanity itself teeters on the edge of extinction and a new world order is waiting in the wings. The entire ULTIMATE X-MEN series has led up to this can't-miss issue!

Marvel Girl quickly deals with the melting down reactor with a little help from the Phoenix Force. Cyclops exacts revenge for Wolverine's betrayal in the Savage Land.

In the aftermath of Magneto's capture and the good will engendered to the X-Men by their role in it, and taking advice from Nick Fury, Federal authorities choose not to prosecute the X-Men and bring the school under federal control.
name: Return of the King: Part 6

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description:
All questions are answered and all fates determined in the final chapter of "The Return of the King"!

Magneto, incarcerated in his plastic prison cell, is paid a visit by Charles Xavier. Charles is there to discuss Magneto's attitude to Homo sapiens and to begin preparing for Magneto's legal defense.

In the Canadian wilderness, Wolverine has been living rough and off the land. He's tracked down by Cyclops who, after blasting him and expelling him from the X-Men, wishes to apologize and welcome Wolverine back into the fold.
name: Return of the King: Part 7

description:
Overview

Recapping the entire series to date, the Runaways‚Äô saga will be told by their youngest member, Molly Hayes. From their betrayal by their parents to the death of her friends, Molly will walk us through the trying times of our troubled teens. Through her eyes, we‚Äôll see the heroes of the Marvel Universe and get her impressions on Captain America, Cloak and Dagger, and the New Avengers. No stone will be left unturned as this precocious pre-teen speaks her mind. Molly‚Äôs tale will be bookended by an original story by C.B. Cebulski and Humberto Ramos. This 48-page special will also include extras.

section featuring never-before-seen sketches and artwork.
name: Runaways Saga

description:
It's Sphinx vs. Sphinx for the love of power - or the Power of Love?!! The All-Warriors crossover begins right here!

Story continues in Night Thrasher (1993) #11.
name: Time and Time Again, Part one: Like flies in amber.

description:
It's Divorce Court on a cosmic level! It's Sphinx vs. Sphinx for control of all space and time and the Warriors are caught in the middle.

Story continues in Night Thrasher (1993) #12.
name: Time and Time Again, Part four: The more things change...

description: The wart between the Sphinxes continues! The now powerless Lady Sphinx bands with the New Warriors but can they possibly stand against the power-mad Lord Sphinx?!
name: Time and Time Again, Part seven: Cornerstones

description:
Nick Fury cameo. Don't miss the Giant-Sized conclusion to the biggest Warriors saga to date! Do not miss Lord and Lady Sphinx in a final showdown that will decide the fate of the cosmos!

The New Warriors are lost in time and space and their only hope is...Hindsight Lad?
name: Time and Time Again, Part eight: Til death do us part!

description: Who stay? Who goes? Who will return? The NEW WARRIORS take off in new directions, confront new challenges, and reveal new secret! Featuring appearances by Cloak & Dagger and Power Pack.
name: Another Think Coming

description: The psychotic super heroic Psionex is back and taking a big bite outta the Big Apple. But when they face every hero's worst nightmare, it threatens to tear the team - and the city - apart! Includes a 12-page insert comic featuring super stars of the NFL.
name: Don't Mind The Maggots

description: Thrash and Rage are back and they've brought some friends. It's the New Warriors vs. their old sparring partners - Psionex! Featuring Scarlet Spider.
name: Bang and Blame

description: Kymaera's back! A powerless Richard Rider is finally reunited with Namorita, but does this mean that things will get better for the Warriors, or worse? Plus, more on the mysterious Rina Patel. Featuring Scarlet Spider.
name: Slave Machine

description: A Speedball spotlight issue! Robbie heads home to visit his father, and ends up in an epic adventure of intrigue and downright improbability as all of his old enemies seem to be coming back! Plus, Scarlet Spider and Justice finally have a sit down that could change their friendship forever. Featuring Scarlet Spider.
name: Return to Springdale

description:
Has the Scarlet Spider gone rogue? It certainly looks that way. The Warriors aim to find out, but are they prepared for what they discover?

Story concludes in Web of Scarlet Spider (1995) #4.
name: Nightmare In Scarlet, Part 2: The Evil Among Us

description: Featuring Scarlet Spider. Guest-starring Guardians of the Galaxy. Rina's visions become horrifyingly true! Tragedy strikes the Warriors like never before!
name: Future Shock, Part 1, Just Yesterday

description: Featuring Scarlet Spider. Guest-starring Guardians of the Galaxy. The two boldest super hero teams of the '90s unite to take on a threat to time and space! And one hero may have to make the ultimate sacrifice.
name: Future Shock, Part 2: Some Time To Kill

description: Featuring Scarlet Spider. One hero has already fallen, can the rest of them be far behind? As the reality of Timeslip's visions come crashing down, the Warriors find themselves besieged by the revival Sphinx - in a battle predestined to end with the death of Speedball!
name: Future Shock, Part 3: Time Will Tell
Future Shock, Part 4: The Fire In Which We Burn

description: The Next Generation of Heroes team up with Earth's Mightiest Heroes to take down Hydra!
name: The Monster In The Basement

description: You've waited long enough. Witness the startling origin of TURBO!
name: Damn the Torpedoes

description: In this penultimate issue, the New Warriors face the wrath of Volx!
name: Surprise..

description: Having tracked down Volx, the New Warriors attack her in space. After forcing her to Earth, the Warriors have to stop the Queen from activating a bomb which will elimate all super-powers from the planet! Without super-heroes, the Dire Wraiths will easily conquer Earth. During the battle, Garthan Saal is killed but is able to restore the Nova powers to Richard Rider before he dies. The weapon detonates but, due to the intervention of the Warriors, proves ineffective and the Queen is captured.
name: Sweet Sorrow

description:
The two universes continue to collide, as Marvel heroes battle DC Villains, and vice versa. It is revealed that there are two cosmic 'brothers', each representing one universe, who decide that they should be the only one of their kind. How to decide? A contest. DC heroes versus Marvel heroes. This series featured reader votes to determine many of the battle outcomes. In this issue, Wonder Woman obtains Mjolnir, the hammer of Thor.

Some notable battles:

  • Captain Marvel vs. Thor (winner: Thor)

  • Aquaman vs. the Sub-Mariner (winner: Aquaman)

  • Flash vs. Quicksilver (winner: Flash)

Notes:

  • Thanks to Ron Marz.
  • Thanks to Sean Hardy.
  • DC artist pages 1-8 and 17-24.
  • Marvel artist pages 9-16 and 25-32.
  • "Marvel Versus DC Scoreboard" one page featuring various DC and Marvel characters versus each other.
  • "Decision '96" one page text piece asking the readers to vote for their favorite DC or Marvel characters as they battle it out in the series.
  • Six pages featuring data on Jubilee, Robin, Flash, Quicksilver, Thor, Captain Marvel (DC), Catwoman, Elektra, Silver Surfer, Green Lantern, Aquaman and Sub-Mariner.
name: Round Two

description:
If you thought ULTIMATE WAR was a "blockbuster" watch Brian Bendis & David Finch raise the ante in a real "BLOCKBUSTER." This new 6-issue story arc teams Spider-Man & Wolverine & will feature upcoming appearances by the ULTIMATES and DAREDEVIL! Why is Wolverine running from the X-Men? That's for Bendis to know and you to find out! A must-have for ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN readers!

Wolverine sits in a diner, eating lunch. He's recognized by a pretty girl who insists on buying him lunch. She leaves. Moments later the diner is ripped apart in a hail of bullets.

Badly injured, Wolverine goes to the nearest safe place to recuperate, the home of Peter Parker. Peter may wish that he'd gone elsewhere as 2 days later, the attackers track Wolverine to Peter's house....
name: Blockbuster: Part One

description: "BLOCKBUSTER" Pt. 2 THE ULTIMATES' Black Widow guest-stars as Spider-Man tries to work closely with Wolverine to discover who was behind the near-fatal attack on the X-Man last issue!
name: Blockbuster: Part 2

description:
"BLOCKBUSTER!" Pt. 3 (of 6) - Wolverine and Spidey struggle to find the hidden enemy who has targeted Wolverine for execution.

Wolverine is blasted deep into Hell's Kitchen on the end of a rocket. His attackers turn their attention to Spider-Man who, concerned for his friend, searches for Wolverine among the exploded wreckage. Though Wolverine remains out of sight, concealing himself among the alleys of Hell's Kitchen. His presence their hasn't gone unnoticed, Daredevil seeks him out to gauge the possible threat to the people of his neighborhood. Daredevil remains in the shadows as the group pursuing Wolverine track him down once again. There may be no escape for him this time. These people know Wolverine from his past and mean to exact revenge for past wrongs.
name: Blockbuster: Part 3
